extendedInfo.description: âThis @FaniumFantasyFB App is going to be new standard for Redraft leagues.â - @NFL_PHDThe future of fantasy football has arrived! Build your dream team of professional football players and manage your roster from the convenience of your phone. More Testimonials:âDrafting on the @FaniumFantasyFB app... Very slick interface. Smooth. Intuitive. Diggin it.â - @footballdiehardâJust wrapped up my first draft on @FaniumFantasyFB. Great solution for leagues that can't get everyone together on one draft date.â - Derek Van Riper, RotowireFeatures:â¢ Mobile Draft: Draft your team on the go from the convenience of your mobile device. Fantasy football has never been this simple.â¢ Push Notifications: Push notifications  keep you updated so you never miss a pick, roster deadline, or game result.â¢ Private Leagues: Compete with your friends to see who can assemble the best roster this season!â¢ Public Leagues: We will match you with 7 other fans to play with so you can begin drafting in no time.â¢ Player Updates: Always stay up to date on the latest news about your team with expert analysis and commentary.â¢ League Chat: Talk trash with your opponents in your fantasy football league.â¢ Trade Players: Trade players with other teams in your league to assemble the best squad.â¢ Avatars: Choose a unique avatar and unlock new characters as you advance through the game.â¢ Edit Rosters: Easily move players in and out of the starting lineup.â¢ Add/Drop Players: One of your players not performing? Drop them for a free agent to maximize your fantasy football points.Get Connected:Follow us on Twitter at:http://twitter.com/FaniumFantasyFBVisit our website at:http://www.fanium.comDisclaimer: Fanium Fantasy Football is not associated with the National Football League (NFL).

reviews.title: So far it sucks!
reviews.comment: Its been days and we haven\'t gotten through the draft yet! 8 hours too long for picks. Draft had to fix itself because some teams had 13 players while others had 10. Hope it plays better than draft works, if we ever get done with the draft that is!
reviews.author: Bobby Bull

reviews.title: Awesome idea
reviews.comment: Been wanting a mobile for god knows how long now...add kickers, defense, and flex/OP options and Ill give 5\342\230\205...also option to have more then 8 ppl
reviews.author: Jermaine Green

reviews.comment: Stats are not customizable, updates for players have inaccurate info, and when my private leahue didn\'t fill, they added it to a public one.
reviews.author: Richard Weakland

reviews.title: Draft
reviews.comment: So far everything is good except the draft, I get it from the sense you want people to have time. People do forget about the draft or get busy, but when I\'m waiting for a player to draft and its over night I get auto pick player. I do not like this. I like the simplicity of how things work
reviews.author: Kendall Roberts

reviews.title: Draft is terrible!
reviews.comment: The season will be over before I get a team drafted. When I get notified it\'s my turn , then I\'m unable to make a pick as in app it still shows previous player still up even though he\'s made a pick. Don\'t waste your time with this.
reviews.author: Ralph Grisi

reviews.title: Waste of time
reviews.comment: I never rate apps, but this one takes the cake. Why would u make a draft that had 8hrs between each person. I have literally been drafting since Sunday, and its Sunday again. Horrible app that looks like its for a child.
reviews.author: Maria Wallace

reviews.title: Just watched the ad video... Weaker than Rebecca Black\'s \"Friday\"
reviews.comment: It\'s cool... Simple. Good app for getting started in fantasy. Not great if you\'re an enthusiast.
reviews.author: Jason Adams

reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.comment: Too many force closes. I like how it\'s a fresh take on fantasy though
reviews.author: J Johnston

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: Maybe add a defense and kicker
reviews.author: Jaedon Herrera

reviews.title: Drafting total nightmare
reviews.comment: Drafting was the most ignorant and foolish process I have ever experienced. I would never go through that type of draft again.....I am looking forward to the season though....
reviews.author: Ryan Waesche

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Good
reviews.author: Marcus Felton

reviews.title: Galaxy S3
reviews.comment: Cool
reviews.author: Tanika Anderson

reviews.title: Fantasy Football
reviews.comment: First time I\'ve really been able to keep up with my draft.  Great use of resources.
reviews.author: Ron Reid

reviews.comment: Would be great if we could see which games are still in play.
reviews.author: Christina Newsome

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: I think they should have a full draft not just QB, RB, WR and TE.  Also it would be nice if the comissioner for each league could have the ability to control settings such as the draft timing (8 hours is a long time).
reviews.author: Derek Hudson

reviews.title: Awesome App
reviews.comment: Thanks for the fix, no more force closes. Great concept!!!
reviews.author: Bruce Tavares

reviews.title: Love Fanium!
reviews.comment: Get this app!
reviews.author: Nicolo Giorgi

reviews.title: Join 55427
reviews.comment: So far so good.Almost full league 55427 join now.
reviews.author: Bryan Landerman

reviews.title: Best!
reviews.comment: Best Fantasy Football App!!
reviews.author: Miguel Garcia

reviews.title: Easy to play
reviews.comment: Fun and ready way to do fantasy football
reviews.author: James Brewer
